Class DrawPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • DrawPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class will take control on creating the shapes array including using the relevant constructors and the draw method This class will extends JPanel and using all the MyShape methods MyShape
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Clear()
      Clear method deletes all the shapes that were drawn by setting ShapeCounter to 0.
      void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
      paintComponent method uses the super class method "paintComponent" parent class MyShape MyShape.
      void setCurrentColor(java.awt.Color currentColor)
      This method sets the color of the shape you're drawing.
      void setCurrentIsFilled(boolean currentIsFilled)
      This method sets the filled/unfilled param.
      void setCurrentShape(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      setCurrentShape method initializes and creates the shapes the user wants (Line Oval or Rectangle).
      void setCurrentShapeType(int currentShapeType)
      This method sets which shape you wand to draw using the JComboBox
      void Undo()
      public method that activated from DrawFrame class when the user click on Undo JButton, This method deletes the last shape that was drawn, (reduces ShapeCounter, and lets the garbage collector do the rest) redraws all the shapes excluding the pne you deleted

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawPanel

        public DrawPanel(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                 javax.swing.JLabel statusLabel)
        DrawPanel Constructor - initializes the frame and statusLabel that came from the DrawFrame DrawFrame class, it uses mouse coordinates to get info about it. updates the array shapes to max limit 100 shapes
        Parameters:
        statusLabel - - the Jlabel that shows the mouse coordinates in the south of the frame.
        frame - - the main frame of the DrawFrame.

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentShape

        public void setCurrentShape(int x1,
                            int y1,
                            int x2,
                            int y2)
        setCurrentShape method initializes and creates the shapes the user wants (Line Oval or Rectangle). when initialized it uses mousePressed coordinates
        Parameters:
        x1 - - coordinate of first point in X axis
        y1 - - coordinate of first point in Y axis
        x2 - - coordinate of second point in X axis
        y2 - - coordinate of second point in Y axis

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        paintComponent method uses the super class method "paintComponent" parent class MyShape MyShape.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • setCurrentShapeType

        public void setCurrentShapeType(int currentShapeType)
        This method sets which shape you wand to draw using the JComboBox
        Parameters:
        currentShapeType - - gets integer: 0-line 1-oval 2-rectangle.

      • setCurrentColor

        public void setCurrentColor(java.awt.Color currentColor)
        This method sets the color of the shape you're drawing. gets it's values form JComboBox as well
        Parameters:
        currentColor - - gets color object Color

      • setCurrentIsFilled

        public void setCurrentIsFilled(boolean currentIsFilled)
        This method sets the filled/unfilled param. can be changed through JCheckBox
        Parameters:
        currentIsFilled - - gets boolean value true - filled, false - unfilled.

      • Undo

        public void Undo()
        public method that activated from DrawFrame class when the user click on Undo JButton, This method deletes the last shape that was drawn, (reduces ShapeCounter, and lets the garbage collector do the rest) redraws all the shapes excluding the pne you deleted

      • Clear

        public void Clear()
        Clear method deletes all the shapes that were drawn by setting ShapeCounter to 0. repaints clear table
